agent.@description: validator of NexSON constraints as well as constraints that would allow a study to be imported into the Open Tree of Life's phylogenetic synthesis tools

K., Evans, T. M., Holst, B.K., Luther, H., Till, W., Zizka, G., Berry, P. E., & Sytsma K. J. 2011a. Phylogeny, adaptive radiation, and historical biogeography in Bromeliaceae: Insights from an eight-locus plastid phylogeny. American J. Bot. 98: 872-895.
